verbs: This is the way... unfortunately
I have spoken... not that anyone listens
Workarounds are my religion (sigh)
I can bring you in warm, or cold... either way it's broken
No living thing has seen me succeed on the first try
Bounty hunting is complicated... so is everything
I'm a Mandalorian. Disappointment is part of my creed
The task is in my care... against my wishes
Wherever I go, problems follow
Dank farrik! ...as expected
I like those odds... said no one ever
Let's just say they might recognize my mistakes
That's not how anything works... anymore
May the Force be with you... you'll need it
The good times are gone... if they existed
I need a crew... and a vacation
You have something I want... to avoid
Don't be afraid... actually, be a little afraid
The child is not for sale... but my sanity is negotiable
I'm not leaving my fate up to chance... fate already left
Party of two... misery loves company
Stop touching things... please, just stop
I accept this honor... reluctantly
Signet of your clan... of pessimists
For Mandalore... I guess
